scenario_text.value:
Looks like...some kind of fruit? Never seen
one like this before...

Looks pretty tasty, doesn’t it, Takuma? Lemme
have a bite!
(Uh, I’m not so sure that’s a good idea...)

(Then again, Agumon doesn’t normally want to
eat random stuff growing wild.)

(Maybe he can somehow instinctively sense
that it’s safe or good for him?)
(What should I do about the strange fruit?)
Let Agumon have it.
Leave it alone.
Let Agumon have it.

If you wanna eat it, then go ahead. But spit
it out quick if it tastes weird!
Okay!
*chomp chomp* *gulp* *buuurp!*
So? How was it?

Nnngh... What the...ah! Hey, my stomach’s
bulging...

How can I be so full already?! I can’t even
moooooove!

Are you okay? I knew you shouldn’t have eaten
that!
Could this be...? FWOOOOOOOOOH!!!
What the?! Agumon, are you okay?!

Yeah! I can’t really explain it, but...
I think I just got stronger?
That made you stronger? Huh...

I got worried when you started yelling;
I thought maybe it was poisonous...

Sorry ’bout that. But I feel like I can
protect you even better now!

(I guess he knew it was going to be something
good...)
(I’m just glad he’s okay!)
Leave it alone.

It might be dangerous. Let’s leave it alone
for now.
Okie dokie! Still, I wonder...
